substances.description: Bleem is a mysterious, otherworldly substance native to the planet Xeridia-III. Its unique properties and behaviors defy human understanding.
Flaglurg is a rare, sentient and shape-shifting substance indigenous to planet Zorvath, a distant world in the outer rim of the Andromeda galaxy.
Sklerm is a fascinating, extraterrestrial material found on planet Kyreth-IV, renowned for its unique properties and potential applications.
